# Commander Elena Vasilieva

## Basic Information
- **Type**: Person
- **Rank**: Commander
- **Nationality**: Russian
- **Age**: 42
- **Specialty**: Aerodynamics and Spacecraft Navigation
- **Years In Service**: 18
- **Hobbies**: Photography and Chess
- **Signature Work**: Pioneering advancements in the ISS's life support systems
- **Favorite Space Meal**: Borscht vacuum pack
- **Leadership Style**: Collaborative and Empathetic
- **Mission Allegiance**: ISS Expedition 68
- **Education**: PhD in Aerospace Engineering from the Moscow Institute of Physics and Technology

## Relationships
- **Supports**: [[mei_lin.md]]
- **Supervises**: [[dr._raj_patel.md]]
- **Operates**: [[harmony_module.md]]
- **Coordinates_With**: [[lieutenant_john_carmichael.md]]

entities.entity_file_content:
# Mei Lin

## Basic Information
- **Type**: Person
- **Role**: Engineer
- **Nationality**: Chinese
- **Age**: 33
- **Specialty**: Robotic systems and microgravity experiments
- **Years In Service**: 10
- **Hobbies**: Calligraphy and Kung Fu movies
- **Signature Work**: Developed an advanced robotic arm for satellite maintenance
- **Favorite Space Meal**: Freeze-dried Kung Pao Chicken
- **Education**: Master's in Mechanical Engineering from Tsinghua University
- **Research Focus**: Impact of microgravity on fluid dynamics
- **Interaction Style**: Analytical and Detail-oriented
- **Mission Allegiance**: ISS Expedition 68

## Relationships
- **Supports**: [[commander_elena_vasilieva.md]]

# Dr. Raj Patel

## Basic Information
- **Type**: Person
- **Nationality**: Indian
- **Age**: 38
- **Specialty**: Materials Science
- **Research Focus**: Microgravity effects on advanced composite materials
- **Years In Service**: 10
- **Education**: PhD in Materials Science from the Indian Institute of Science, Bangalore
- **Favorite Space Meal**: Chana Masala dehydrated pack
- **Hobbies**: Astrophotography and playing the guitar
- **Signature Experiment**: Leading research on carbon nanotube synthesis in microgravity environments
- **Mission Allegiance**: ISS Expedition 68
- **Physical Fitness Routine**: Daily treadmill and resistance training
- **Language Proficiency**: English, Hindi, and Russian

## Relationships
- **Supervises**: [[commander_elena_vasilieva.md]]

# Harmony Module

## Basic Information
- **Entity Type**: Research Module
- **Type**: Entity
- **Function**: Central hub for linking laboratory modules
- **Length**: 7.2
- **Width**: 4.4
- **Built Year**: 2008
- **Primary Materials**: Aluminum alloys
- **Customs**: Acts as a common area for astronauts to meet and share meals
- **Emergency Protocols**: Houses manual override control systems

## Relationships
- **Operates**: [[commander_elena_vasilieva.md]]

# Lieutenant John Carmichael

## Basic Information
- **Type**: Person
- **Rank**: Lieutenant
- **Nationality**: American
- **Age**: 35
- **Specialty**: Robotics and Mechanical Systems
- **Years In Service**: 12
- **Hobbies**: Guitar and Basketball
- **Signature Work**: Enhancing robotic arm capabilities for station maintenance
- **Favorite Space Meal**: Mac and Cheese freeze-dried pack
- **Mission Allegiance**: ISS Expedition 69
- **Education**: MS in Mechanical Engineering from Massachusetts Institute of Technology
- **Leadership Style**: Pragmatic and Technically Focused

## Relationships
- **Coordinates_With**: [[commander_elena_vasilieva.md]]

# Tranquility Node

## Basic Information
- **Entity Type**: Life Support System
- **Type**: Entity
- **Location**: International Space Station
- **Maintenance Schedule**: Bi-weekly
- **Installation Date**: February 2010
- **Designed By**: European Space Agency in collaboration with NASA
- **Crew Capacity Support**: 6
- **Primary Function**: Housing for life support systems and crew quarters
- **Additional Function**: Backup air and water purification system
- **Notable Feature**: Contains the advanced oxygen generation system
- **Emergency Protocol**: Automated shutdown sequence in case of failure

## Relationships
- **Uses**: [[dr._raj_patel.md]]

# Sofia Gomez

## Basic Information
- **Type**: Person
- **Nationality**: Argentinian
- **Age**: 34
- **Specialty**: Astrobiology
- **Research Focus**: Plant growth in microgravity
- **Years In Service**: 7
- **Education**: PhD in Biology from the University of Buenos Aires
- **Favorite Space Meal**: Empanadas dehydrated pack
- **Hobbies**: Sketching and playing the flute
- **Signature Experiment**: Investigating the effects of microgravity on plant genetic expression
- **Mission Allegiance**: ISS Expedition 68
- **Physical Fitness Routine**: Yoga and resistance training
- **Language Proficiency**: Spanish, English, and Russian

## Relationships
- **Shares_Resources_With**: [[dr._raj_patel.md]]

# Alpha Solar Array

- **Entity Type**: Energy Source

# Zvezda Service Module

## Basic Information
- **Entity Type**: Living Quarters
